Buttons

  1. Dashboard
  2. Buttons
Button Variants

To use a color variant, use .btn-{color} with .btn.

Light Button

To use light style button, use .btn-light-{color} with .btn.

Outline Button

To use outline button variant, use .btn-outline-{color} with .btn.

Rounded Button

To use rounded button variant, apply .btn-rounded class.

Button With Icon

You can add icon inside button.

Icon Only

You can only use .btn-icon when you only want icon in your button.
